lenders.name: Leo

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: I like helping others

lenders.name: Lynda
lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving people a hand up, and I realize how privileged and fortunate I am.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with people who are struggling to find balance and happiness in their lives.

lenders.name: Grace
lenders.loan_because: There is no better way to live than to give!
lenders.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell their homes, hopes and dreams.  How lucky am I to help people with something as important as thier home!

lenders.name: McCormick Family
lenders.loan_because: God has placed this on my heart to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people get a college education so that they can better themselves.

lenders.name: Bart & Paula
lenders.loan_because: We think it is so wonderful to be able to help people to help themselves all over the world.  It's a win win.  These people get the help they need to make a better life for themselves and their families and we can use that same money to help someone else once it's repaid.  Talk about  the gift that keep on giving!! It's a phenomenal concept and we are so proud to be able to be a part of it.

lenders.name: Bianca
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other people.
lenders.occupational_info: I design websites.

lenders.name: Kristi
lenders.loan_because: I like to improve people's lives. It gives me great joy to help.

lenders.name: Beebee
lenders.loan_because: as the human race, the people of Earth we can do much better than what we have been doing. Help who you can, globally, locally.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a not for profit affordable housing group and I am a Mom.

lenders.name: Rich
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me with many things and I want to share with those in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I am self employed and have a very easy business. I am blessed and very grateful for what I have.

lenders.name: Scott & Mark
lenders.loan_because: We've heard about these microloan programs for some time and love the idea of being able to help someone directly to build their own business.
lenders.occupational_info: We create websites and also run several travel related online directories.

lenders.name: Tomas
lenders.loan_because: I believe in good and honest ideas from hard working people.
lenders.occupational_info:
I'm a management consultant. I visit companies and help them improve their goals and plan changes for their businesses. I help them plan, and help them achieve better results.

I'm also an artist :)

lenders.name: Stacey
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Lori
lenders.loan_because: We can and should

lenders.name: cindy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other women success in business.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is great, because I get to talk with other people who want a better life for them and they children.  I teach other parents how to make money, saving money the same time.

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: I want to support those with the courage to dream...
lenders.occupational_info: I am a child custody mediator for Superior Court. When couples divorce or split up, I help them make plans for their children, so that children are able to keep relationships with both parents.

lenders.name: Deborah
lenders.loan_because: It's a rewarding thing to do, and because I feel blessed with a good life, it's the RIGHT thing to do.

lenders.name: Chandra
lenders.loan_because: Sharing a little with others make me feel good.
lenders.occupational_info: A single mother of a teenager, I work seven days a week as an Administrative Coordinator at a University

lenders.name: Bobby
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help make a better life for as many people as possible.
lenders.occupational_info: I own an air conditioning and refrigeration company.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I want to give ... I want to make a difference ... I believe in karma ... I believe in "paying it forward" ... I believe it is simply the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: As an energy practitioner, I offer Reiki and EFT sessions both in-person and long distance.  As a professor, I teach music history and music theory online.  As a consultant, I help start-ups with set-up, human resources, strategic planning, human development, recruiting, network marketing, editing, and system hardware/software troubleshooting.  Basically, I help people! :-)

lenders.name: Glen
lenders.occupation: in transition to a new career
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I know the power of giving.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the state of California.

lenders.name: ShaKima
lenders.loan_because: Feels good to help others achieve their dreams and aspirations~
lenders.occupational_info: To ensure smiling faces to all people I encounter.

lenders.name: Theresa
lenders.loan_because: I know what it is like to struggle to get a head. I know the feeling of just needing a little more money, and I could do what I want to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Beauty Consultant with Mary Kay. I buy Skin Care products and makeup and sell it to customers. I give women makeovers and show them how our products work.

lenders.name: Sandy
lenders.occupation: Professor, English to Speakers of Other Languages
lenders.loan_because: I know it works! I believe in giving people a chance, and we can't rely on governments to solve socio-economic problems.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English to adult immigrants. My students come mostly from Latin America, but I also have some from Asia and the Middle East.

lenders.name: Natalie
lenders.loan_because: I can, shouldn't everyone?

lenders.name: Rosanna
lenders.occupation: real estate broker and corporate travel manager
lenders.loan_because: I'm selfish! ;-)  Giving is the ultimate expression of Love, for it is Love itself!
lenders.occupational_info: I do several things.  I manage the corporate travel program for a large shopping mall developer/manager.  I am also a licensed independent real estate broker.

lenders.name: Natalie
lenders.loan_because: It is the least I can do.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach children with disabilities ages 14-18.

lenders.name: viva
lenders.loan_because: I get a great deal pf pleasure out of giving.
lenders.occupational_info: I make clay pieces that decorate ones home or garden.

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to change their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I make coffee and other beverages.

lenders.name: harold & gina
lenders.loan_because: We are in a position to help, and this is a tremendous organization that assists small businesses and families. We feel that by lending, it gives the people a sense of pride and ownership.

lenders.name: Shellie
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to give!

lenders.name: renee
lenders.loan_because: I want others to have the opportunities that I have had in my life. If my donations can help someone live a life that makes them happy, a life that allows them to support their familes, then I'll have done what I wanted to do through Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a large telecommunications company. I work in project management and support certified SIx Sigma managers who use data to identify processes that can be changed to save the company money.

lenders.name: Micheline
lenders.loan_because: Christ my God asked me to

lenders.name: April
lenders.loan_because: of selfish reasons...I feel good when I give. It's like Christmas year-round! :-) I've seen the amazing things that this and other programs like this do for people and I'm so grateful that I can be part of it. Thanks Kiva!

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: Sharing is a requisite for caring.

lenders.name: Joanne N Joan
lenders.whereabouts: Livingston and Big Pine Key TX and Florida
lenders.loan_because: In a small way we can help someone have a better life.
lenders.occupational_info: Using fabric we create art , soft sculptures and pictures that we  show in Galleries in Key West, FL, Big Pine Key, FL and Dollywood, TN.

lenders.name: Laurie
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others to have a good life.
lenders.occupational_info: I stay home to raise my two daughters. It's a gift I don't take for granted.

lenders.name: Jacqueline
lenders.loan_because: I feel that it is the right thing for me to do. I believe that each of us can do one thing, small or large to help change the face of the world.  Everyone deserves to live their best life.
lenders.occupational_info: I support the local public  Middle School Special Education Dept.. offering services and support to all children with learning disabilities.

lenders.name: Krista
lenders.loan_because: I want to give a handup not a handout.

lenders.name: Mojgan
lenders.loan_because: I know these people work hard and don't have much and yet they are full of life and are so appreciative of what they have, I just want to be a part of all that.
lenders.occupational_info: I love people and love to help.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a law office that defends poor people who cannot afford a lawyer.  I am also a writer.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: We are all born equal, but do not all have the same opportunities.  I have been fortunate in my life and hope that my small sacrifice of monies will be a "hand-up"  that some others need.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a paramedic who provides medicine and emergency care to sick and injured people.  I live 50 km south of Philadelphia.

lenders.name: Chloe
lenders.loan_because: I feel very fortunate with what I have and want to help others.

lenders.name: Adriana & Daniel
lenders.loan_because: It gives us a chance to give to someone who is making a change or chance at their dream. We see it as "paying it forward".
lenders.occupational_info:
Adriana is a stay at home mom with a background in the medical field.
Daniel has been at his job for 14 years.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because:
"You must be the change you wish to see in the world".- Mahatma Ghandi

When we get a chance to help, lets just do it.

lenders.name: Lloyd
lenders.loan_because: God blessed me and I wish to share this blessing with those less fortunate, but willing to work for what they receive.
lenders.occupational_info: I am fortunate to be able to be in a win-win-win situation.  I save businesses money on their phone bills and in turn retain their business for the particular telephone company, and in return receive a small commission.  We ALL benefit!

lenders.name: Sharona
lenders.loan_because: I just think it is incredible to be able to loan $25 to help someone change their life...it is the least I can do for now...it feels great!!!!!

lenders.name: Kevin & Jessica
lenders.loan_because: If we all help a little, many people will be helped a lot.

lenders.name: Maureen
lenders.loan_because: I have been incredibly blessed in my life. Despite my disability, I have the good fortune to be able to afford many assistive devices. I want others to be able to feel as independent in their lives despite their hardships.
lenders.occupational_info: I used to manage a large OB/GYN department at a local hospital.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others.

lenders.name: Bridget
lenders.loan_because: Not only am I privileged to assist people all over the globe, but as they repay and the money is reloaned, they are empowering each other!  How incredible is that?

lenders.name: Steve and Gayle
lenders.loan_because: of our Peace Corps experience and we have the funds to do so.We enjoy watching people improve themselves by their own hard work.

lenders.name: Mrs G
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I design and monitor the development and production of a fashion line.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: I have a lot of admiration for someone who starts their own business and I think this is a wonderful program to allow people to support entrepreneurs.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a little boy who is the greatest challenge I have ever undertaken.  He also gives me the most joy I have ever known!

lenders.name: Taren
lenders.loan_because: Its great to know that a small donation can help someone else build their future and become a business owner.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with clients helping them feel better about who they are and encouraging more entrepreneurs.  My goal is to build a legacy for my family and to continue to make a positive impact to those I come in contact with.

lenders.name: Neil
lenders.loan_because:
I wouldn't be in the position I am today if I didn't have some assistance along the way.  This seems like a great way to impact peoples lives in a positive way.

If my small contribution can help a person develop, grow, and expand an income stream that improves the lifes of them and their families, then it's worth every penny.

lenders.name: Cody
lenders.loan_because: I knew in my heart that giving to others would be right.  I felt a connection with Miguel.  God bless you and your business.
lenders.occupational_info: Student

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: I know what getting a loan can do to help someone who wants to better their life.

lenders.name: Jade
lenders.loan_because: I saw the web site on Oprah so I wanted to help people in other places.  It makes me feel good that i'm helping people. Thats is why I loan.
lenders.occupational_info: I don't have a job I go to middle school.  My middle school is in Las Vegas. In middle school I learn math,reading, and so on so forth.

lenders.name: Gordon
lenders.loan_because: It's a good thing.

lenders.name: Dave and Maralee
lenders.loan_because: What a wonderful idea!  How could we not be part of this?
lenders.occupational_info: golf, travel, golf !

lenders.name: Family of Five
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back for all the good that has come in my life.  I also want to set a good example for my three children and expose them to generosity at a young age.
lenders.occupational_info: I stay home with three very active children under the age of five!

lenders.name: Adriane
lenders.loan_because: I believe that we all need help at some point in our lives.  It makes me feel that I can make a difference in this world.  I want to teach my children that no matter how little you have there is always room to help someone else out.
lenders.occupational_info: I volunteer with organizations I believe in and raise our children

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.occupation: Former HealthCare Manager and now Stay at Home Mom

lenders.name: Lauren
lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving...
lenders.occupational_info: I close loans and perform real estate transactions...

lenders.name: Brenda
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed with all that I have(although not very much). I feel it is my duty to share it with those less fortunate. It is a wonderful feeling to know that my small donation has made such an impact in someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: The work is both rewarding and very challenging.

lenders.name: Linh
lenders.loan_because: the opportunity was presented to me and I am grateful for the gift.

lenders.name: Nicole & Hiren
lenders.loan_because: We're blessed to be able to help others.
lenders.occupational_info:
Hiren helps make investment decisions for a pension fund. Nicole writes, teaches English to speakers of other languages, and designs jewelry. 

Join Kiva lenders from around the world at  www.KivaFriends.org

lenders.name: Diana
lenders.loan_because: I believe it's the right thing to do - to give a hand up, not a handout!
lenders.occupational_info: I make it easier for someone to buy and sell homes.

lenders.name: AMY AND LYLE
lenders.loan_because: We are Christians and care about what happens to the families and children who need help.  If we can't offer a mere $25 to help someone feed their family, then it is a pathetic representation of me and my family.
lenders.occupational_info: I help manage the day to day operation of three medical clinics.  We work with 7 doctors and 2 nurse practitioners, along with about 25 staff members.  It is a very rewarding and fulfilling carrier.

lenders.name: Rigo
lenders.loan_because: A dollar goes a long way.

lenders.name: Beverly
lenders.loan_because: I like helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a wellness coach. I teach others how to maintain a healthy body.

lenders.name: Travis (Jose Alberto)
lenders.loan_because: I was adopted from Comayagua Honduras in 1991, and would like to give someone else a chance.
lenders.occupational_info: I am starting out in life, too.  I received training as an electrician and in welding.  I'm currently looking for a job.

lenders.name: Corinne
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. It's a privilege to empower others and loaning gives me another opportunity to assist.

lenders.name: Jamael
lenders.loan_because: This is a great and easy way to give back.  Lending money allows you to leverage your charitible intentions, without actually extending charity!
lenders.occupational_info: I help to invest money for my company.

lenders.name: Mary & Michael
lenders.loan_because: It just seems like such a unique opportunity. Who can say they help someone in a third world country make their life better. It feels great.

lenders.name: Eileen
lenders.loan_because: This is a great innovative way to give back to those in need.  I like that 100% of my money will be given to the recepient then repaid to help another person.  What an awesome program!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired insurance specialist.

lenders.name: Pete & Carol
lenders.loan_because: We feel that we are doing our part to help others. . .
lenders.occupational_info: I (Pete) am semi-retired and work PT as a Hospitality Consultant in Private Clubs, Hotels/Resorts, & Senior Retirement Communities. My 'better half' (Carol), is a retired elementary school teacher (after 25 years. . .).

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate to be in a position where I can give to those who may need assistance in fulfilling their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a trial lawyer in Los Angeles.  I am blessed with doing what I love, but more importantly, with a beautiful family.

lenders.name: Diana House
lenders.loan_because: As a self-employed businesswoman, I have gone through the lean years and am now beginning to enjoy some financial serenity.  While I continually ask myself, how can I give back, I am reluctant to put hard-earned dollars into a "vat" that has little accountability to the end use of my contribution.  I was completely intrigued with this concept and will double up and re-invest on payoffs of loans.  This clearly appeals to my sense of being an entrepreneur.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a professional consultant to legal professionals (lawyers, expert witnesses, bailbonds companies, private investigators) in placement and growth of their Internet marketing dollars.  I'm proud to be in Sales!  In the end, we all are!!!

lenders.name: Thomasena
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I truly feel that God has blessed me and my family in so many ways.  To be blessed is to be able to give.
lenders.occupational_info: I do a lot of paperwork in my job.

lenders.name: Melissa & Eric
lenders.loan_because: It's time to give back.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: it's helping communities to grow.

lenders.name: Cile
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: Business to business advertising sales

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: I like the fact that even the little bit I can do helps make a real difference.

lenders.name: Ruzbeh
lenders.loan_because:
I want to help people in 3rd world countries who need the money.
I think everybody should help each other, after all we are all cohabitants of the same planet.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a computer consultant/e-business specialist.

lenders.name: Jenni
lenders.loan_because: I can't think of a reason not to.

lenders.name: JOANNA
lenders.loan_because: I want to help. I want to feel a connection.  We do what we can in life and Kiva helps us do a little more.  Throwing a pebble into the ocean - begins with a ripple and then eventually becomes a wave of change.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a story teller.  I work in TV primarily.  But I would love to make a film one day. One of my favourite all time movies is "Cinema Paradiso" about an Italian director who reflects back on his childhood after he learns of the death of his beloved friend back in his hometown that he left years before.  I love this movie because among many things - it's about family and community and never forgetting where you come from - even if you are miles and years away. Movies help us to connect - on a personal level and at the same time on a universal scale.  I think Kiva does the same thing so beautifully.  I'm glad to be a small part of this terrific organization.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: it feels good to help others less fortunate
lenders.occupational_info: I dye, paint, cut, stitch fabric to make art for the walls

lenders.name: The Heron-Clark Family
lenders.loan_because: We believe in the promise of empowerment.  The fact that so much can change with such little monetary input is a humbling thought.  We can all change lives, we just need to take the initiative and make it happen.

lenders.name: Shannon
lenders.loan_because: It is so rewarding and I think makes as much of an impact on the world community as many other much larger projects.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage large website projects for various US Government agencies.  These websites either help connect job seekers and employers with job opportunities in the government or connect military veterans and their spouses with employment opportunities.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: any step I'm able to take that helps make this world better for everything living on it, is what I want to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Since my parents died last year, I felt compelled to retire and live simply so that I could be of service to others. I volunteer when I can and do what I'm able to do.  I donate as well but not as much as I volunteer.  One day I might go back to work but until then I'll just keep on looking for ways to help.

lenders.name: Charm
lenders.loan_because: My adopted mom was a school teacher and entrepreneur.  During her life she was into real estate, a poultry owner, a bakery owner, and even had a fishing boat business.
lenders.occupational_info: I have been a nurse for 6 years.

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: Well, golly gee, someone better do it.

lenders.name: HERLTC
lenders.loan_because: We are all humans living on this earth.  The earth's resources belong to all of us equally.
lenders.occupational_info: Doing what I enjoy doing.

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: I lend money because I can and because I think that everyone who wants to control their destiny and shape their future should never be held back by lack of money.

lenders.name: David Jay
lenders.loan_because: I've realized that it's impossible to do anything great alone - we all need the help of others and this is one way I can pass along what people have given to me.
lenders.occupational_info: I help photographers create freedom in their lives by sharing technology and knowledge.

lenders.name: Leonard
lenders.loan_because: At this point in my life I am able.  I am paying back.

lenders.name: Carolyn
lenders.loan_because: My cup runneth over.  It is a privilege to share what I have been given.

lenders.name: juliette
lenders.loan_because:
we live in a global village. i help people all the time and enjoy doing it. 

and i  am curious to see how the clothing bussiness i made a loan to  does.

i wish the owners much success.
lenders.occupational_info:
i keep my house, grocery shop, take care of my 2 dogs. 

i do volunteer work w/ 2 rescue dog organizations.

i sew for pleasure and i use my computer to talk about many subjets w/ people all around the world.

i also  do interfaith work w/ women of all differnt faiths.

and i am a passionate political activist.!!

lenders.name: Walid
lenders.loan_because: i am a human being and when another person needs help, i try to help. i loan because in this case i can help people help themselves and i know my money will be handled in the best way.
lenders.occupational_info: i film music videos and documentaries.

lenders.name: Wendy
lenders.loan_because: We have been blessed with a home, a healthy family, and food on the table.  So, we will try to share those blessings with others!

lenders.name: George & Ruby
lenders.loan_because: It's a wonderful idea.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies install and use large software systems.

lenders.name: Erica
lenders.loan_because: It's amazing to help people.
lenders.occupational_info: I oversee retail stores that sell time management training and tools.

lenders.name: Christy
lenders.loan_because: As Winston Churchill once said...We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give.

lenders.name: Cambridge Rietemas
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a law student and my wife is a high school special education teacher.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: joy comes from uplifting and empowering people.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the editor of Daily Word® magazine, published by Unity http://www.dailyword.com

lenders.name: I-Team
lenders.loan_because: It's a clever way of helping others; and since it's a loan and not a gift, the same monies can then be used to help additional families.
lenders.occupational_info: Real Estate Investment and Development

lenders.name: Dana
lenders.loan_because: I have so much and these women struggle to take care of their families.

lenders.name: Maya
lenders.loan_because: people's dreams need to be funded.
lenders.occupational_info: I talk to people about movies and get paid for it.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a travel agent.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I am very grateful for what I have and want to share with others. I've had many advantages living in the US.
lenders.occupational_info: Former administrative assistant now retired.

lenders.name: Hayley
lenders.loan_because: I am trying to teach my kids about the world around them and to open their hearts.

lenders.name: Rylee Michael
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other people.
lenders.occupational_info: I love science.  My favorite way to spend my day is learning how everything works.

lenders.name: Mary Ann
lenders.loan_because: Honestly, I have been very fortunate in my life and have worked hard for everything I have accomplished.  It just feels right to give back to those who have a dream and are willing to work for that dream.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a very busy grocery store which is primarily male dominated. I have worked up from the bottom to achieve my current position.  I have been lucky to have had the opportunity to open two new grocery stores for the chain and have a great sense of pride in doing this. I never would have imagined I could have accomplished so much coming from a troubled childhood.  Like Nike says "just do it".

lenders.name: Larina
lenders.loan_because: I heard about this program while watching Oprah, and I just immediately felt that this was a way I could help others grow their businesses.  I also feel it is very important to give.  I am happy that my business is successful, and I am able to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell properties in Squamish, located between Vancouver and Whistler, BC in Canada.

lenders.name: Correatown
lenders.loan_because: we all have the ability to do something good... just because. & everyone has a dream right! /// I hope to make some small difference in someone else's life because in my own life people have taken a chance on me and that made ALL the difference!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an independent musician in Los Angeles.

lenders.name: Kiran
lenders.loan_because: by sharing we all can prosper... There should be no place for an ugly thing like poverty in this world..

lenders.name: Marsha
lenders.loan_because: I am a single parent and struggled for some time.  I am now in a postition where I can help someone else.  I feel blessed.
lenders.occupational_info: I assess medical claims with the Saskatchewan Department of Health.

lenders.name: Genrong
lenders.loan_because: someone needs help
lenders.occupational_info: hedge fund analyst

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because: I'm passionate about helping the poor and as an entrepreneur, love the idea of helping other entrepreneurs pursue their dreams and secure their financial futures for themselves. I also love Ecuador and can't wait to go back to visit the business(es) I'm sponsoring.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in someone's life and inspire others to give.
lenders.occupational_info: Soli Deo Gloria.

lenders.name: Connie & Steve
lenders.loan_because: It's our pleasure to do so.  We're grateful to share what we have with others.
lenders.occupational_info: We're a family who feels like part of our duty as citizens of the planet is put a hand out when others are in need. It's such a joy and privilege.

lenders.name: Dave & Cath
lenders.loan_because: We support your work.
lenders.occupational_info: We work very hard and can share.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I am selfish. It really makes ME feel good to give, and it is something  we all should do. Sometimes $25 is hard to scrape up, but when I can scrape it up, it feels good to give it to someone worse off than myself.
lenders.occupational_info: I worked at a military hospital in an administrative position. I also was a volunteer firefighter in my community. We would be the first to respond to fires, car accidents,  medical calls, or even a cat up a tree! Unfortunately, I am no longer able to work due to my health. I really miss being a part of the Fire Department.

lenders.name: Samantha
lenders.loan_because: I have been so fortunate throughout my life.  It's the least I can do.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a doctor who cares for children.

lenders.name: Doni
lenders.loan_because: I can't be there myself to help each person I'd like to help.
lenders.occupational_info: If you need technical assistance with your Mac, or your iPhone, I can help you fix it. :)

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed with so much during my life, I want to "give back" to others that have not been as fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a preschool of about 120 beautiful, cheerful, energy-filled preschoolers ranging from age 2 to 5.

lenders.name: Darren
lenders.loan_because: I should

lenders.name: Debbie
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to have resources to spare to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a manager for a teachers union working to get better pay and working conditions for all school employees.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.occupational_info: I manage mainframe computers for my employer.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: It would be impossible to justify not helping.

lenders.name: Tiffany
lenders.loan_because: It makes the world a little better
lenders.occupational_info: I help people with advanced end stage cancer by giving comfort through medicine and love.

lenders.name: Innerpreneur Ventures
lenders.loan_because: Making loans through Kiva fits nicely with what we're about: 'An Innerpreneur is an entrepreneur who uses their business toward personal fulfillment (creatively, spiritually, emotionally) and social change.'
lenders.occupational_info: We design, build and repair Innerpreneur-oriented commercial enterprises.

lenders.name: Alfonso
lenders.loan_because:
I believe that the only real help for developping countries is to make their people autonomous and not dependent on external ressources. 
Helping this people in making business, is one way of giving them the needed independance.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop and maintain web services for a big telecommunication company. My areas are social networks and online collaboration tools for end customers.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: Although I am a pensioner, my income is enough to support me comfortably. I give what I can when I can, to share with others is to share that comfort.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired Mechanic, member of a local community group known as a Menshed. Our aim is to promote health and well being among men, who often neglect their health. We also assist other community groups with projects, do maintenance jobs for the elderly, repair furniture and help younger people develop skills to help with employment opportunities. We do not discriminate by race, religion, sex, mental or physical disability. Many of our members have skills and experiences they have learned over their working lives, we try to pass them on in a non-judgemental, friendly atmosphere.

lenders.name: Umesh
lenders.loan_because: I get make a difference in the lives of people I will probably never meet in my life. Trying to find that strain of human instinct which makes us help one another without any self interest. Recently I had a couple of repayments (the firsts since I started on Kiva) and it has brought that feeling mission accomplished. Also, it has motivated me to increase the number of les missions qui changent des vies.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am working as project manager for a mid-size French consulting firm based in Paris currently working in SCM but building my strengths in becoming a brand building professional. I run a fledgling internet boutique:

We source authentic and original products from artisans in Africa and Asia (http://www.bozea.com/decoration-maison/artisans-arts-de-la-table-decoration) at good price for them and sell them on  http://www.bozea.com/decoration-maison in categories of decoration, lamps, tableware, unique decorative pieces, art de la table, pièces uniques and fashion accessories. Each of our artisanal products make ideal gift idea for your loved ones and yourself as well!

For my French friends...

Nous achetons des produits authentiques et originaux des artisans en Afrique et en Asie. Nous leur donner une bonne valeur pour leurs produits.

Vous pouvez découvrir et acheter notre sélection, flânez à votre guise parmi les objets de décoration, les lampes, l'art de la table, les pièces uniques ou encore notre clin d'œil, la catégorie mode sur http://www.bozea.com/decoration-maison/artisans-arts-de-la-table-decoration

lenders.name: Ysmay
lenders.loan_because: There are many people in the world not nearly as fortunate as I am.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: I really want to help someone who wants to work, and just needs a little boost!

lenders.name: Man
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the human spirit and watching it soar is well worth any amount of money
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a professional musician and artist with over 2.5 million in record sales. I know what it is like to be poor and then follow my dreams to success. Hopefully I can now help others.

lenders.name: Cady
lenders.loan_because: It's an easy way to help others in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach our future generation so they can have the lives they want and deserve, and be contributing members of society.

lenders.name: mary ann /Squantum ma.
lenders.loan_because: I was there at one time stand tall and proud, ask for,  and pay back loans ,you go girl/women/mother!!
lenders.occupational_info: very hard and demanding but I love caring for others children

lenders.name: Leigh
lenders.loan_because: others have helped me when I needed help so badly and was unable to tackle it all by myself.
lenders.occupational_info: I have the best job in the world...working with students, parents and teachers.   It's awesome and very life-affirming!

lenders.name: Terry
lenders.loan_because: These small loans help someone else so much!

lenders.name: Indira
lenders.loan_because: I feel fortunate and blessed to be able to live, work and enjoy life and want to help tess fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: gratifying

lenders.name: JoAnn
lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving everyone the opportunity to be successful.
lenders.occupational_info: I help entrepreneurs and individuals become successful by providing Success Coaching through one on one coaching and holding Success Seminars.

lenders.name: dorene
lenders.loan_because: I CARE.
lenders.occupational_info: I HELP PEOPLE, THEY HELP ME

lenders.name: Cain
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: In our hustle and bustle to "make it" in the US, we sometimes forget how lucky we are. We can change lives, we can help to close the gap. It is our responsibility as citizens of the world to look beyond our own circles and try to make a difference.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: Just the right thing to do..

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to help others around the world.  What a great way to help promote the American Experience than to help someone achieve a business start up.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a 500 seat seafood restaurant in a busy tourist town.

lenders.name: Colleen
lenders.loan_because: We have to help each other to make the world a better place, each person, one person at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired Irish musician, concert producer and sound engineer. Currently the U.S. Compliance Manager for Austrian based international freight forwarder.

lenders.name: Anthony
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me in many ways, and I believe that God blesses us in order for us to take our blessings and use them to bless others.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach psychology and sociology.

lenders.name: Rev. Cori
lenders.loan_because: If Jesus asked me for a loan, I would give it to him and I wouldn't expect any interest.  But he doesn't need one so he said, "as you did it for one of the least of these my family" you did it for me.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the spiritual leader of a congregation of Episcopalians (Anglicans) in southwest Miami, Florida.  I lead worship, lead Bible Studies, pray, and encourage others to follow Jesus Christ and to enjoy the gifts of life and love that God gives to us!

lenders.name: Jeremy
lenders.loan_because: I can either give the money to people who need it, or Starbucks, who doesn't.
lenders.occupational_info: Dangerously boring.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I think empowered women across the world will ultimately cure many of the world's problems, especially women in the poorer countries.  More power to them!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm retired from my job now, but I work as a volunteer at the Bronx Zoo, part of the Wildlife Conservation Society.  I try to teach our visitors something about animals and why they should be protected in the wild.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: Administering the health and functioning of computer networks.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: I have been fortunate in my life and have the ability now to assist others.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach others how to use the tools they need to do their work.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.occupational_info: I own an Insurance agency. We sell auto, home, commercial, life and financial products.

lenders.name: Shannon
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance.  My mother worked so hard to give me the chance to go to college and pursue my dreams.  That has allowed me to do the same for my children and anyone else who needs a helping hand. I cannot think of a better way to use my resources.

lenders.name: Marc
lenders.loan_because: in my own experience, I have started with nothing but will and worked hard to make something of myself.
lenders.occupational_info: I operate industrial equipment to purify dirty, contaminated water to make it safe to return it to rivers and streams.

lenders.name: Cindy
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves to have a better life; if I can do something to aid in that struggle for someone else, than I know that I have truly made a difference.

lenders.name: Valerie
lenders.loan_because: People helping other people is what will make this world a more livable place.

lenders.name: Dawn
lenders.loan_because: I have had the fortune of people helping me help myself in times of need, and now its my turn to help others.

lenders.name: Christie
lenders.loan_because: I know that every little bit we give makes a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I monitor inbound and outboud calls to better enhance our customer's experience.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: One of the greatest ways we can help others is to help them help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I design and build software solutions for a big American company.

lenders.name: Big O
lenders.loan_because: I'm blessed

lenders.name: Diana
lenders.loan_because: $25 dollars is such a tiny amount to give but it goes a long way to the people who are requesting the money.  It can help change the world, one person or family at a time.

lenders.name: courtney
lenders.loan_because: its the right thing to do
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a mom to 2 girls, 2 dogs, and a neighborhood full of kids

lenders.name: Jeffrey
lenders.loan_because: I want to help entrepreneurs around the world get their business started.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a modeling and simulation engineer in the aerospace industry.

lenders.name: Jude
lenders.loan_because: I am passionate about empowering others, I am a believer of economic and social empowerment, humanities power to reduce inequity, every life has equal value and that a commitment to interconnectedness and communication can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: Entrepreneurial Spirit just like you.  If you can dream it, you can create it.  Let's join together and be world conscious.

lenders.name: Pepi & Harvey
lenders.loan_because: We are in a position to help others with the financial assistance that they might not receive if it were not for KIVA.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I live in what I believe to be the best country in the world (Canada). We need to do all we can to help developing countries become self sufficient. Small business entrepreneurs are the backbone of this. If I can help out a fellow business person get ahead in life, then I feel it is my duty to do this.
lenders.occupational_info: I buy and sell stamps for collectors.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of my children, and husband, and do a little computer work when I can. I cook, clean, mow the grass,

lenders.name: Milly
lenders.loan_because: It's an opportunity to participate in something marvelous.
lenders.occupational_info: I translate texts from English into Spanish and also serve as a Spanish/English interpreter. I sometimes also record the Spanish voice in videos and recorded messages.

lenders.name: The Brown Family
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do and it feels good!

lenders.name: Renee
lenders.loan_because: Hard working people should be given a chance to succeed!

lenders.name: Dennis & Ann
lenders.loan_because: This is a real no-brainer. Helping someone help themselves is essence of being human and a world citizen.  This organization offers an amazing vehicle for direct person to person assistance

lenders.name: Roy
lenders.loan_because: I love to help people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info:
I give tours of the Big Island (Hawaii)
to Japanese tourists. Mahalo.

lenders.name: Paul Usungu
lenders.loan_because: I feel I make a positive impact in someone's life.

lenders.name: Nikki
lenders.loan_because: We are fortunate enough to be blessed with love, family, good health, a successful business, and all the things that we need in life.  We want to Pay it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: We are the owners of  an excavating company.  We provide services including residential and commercial excavation, and sanitary sewer.

lenders.name: Byron
lenders.loan_because: I want to.
lenders.occupational_info: I build computer graphics that allow people to control industrial machinery and process plants.

lenders.name: Martha
lenders.loan_because: We each have the duty to try to make the world a more humane place
lenders.occupational_info: I help discover drugs to fight disease

lenders.name: Morris M Kromah
lenders.occupational_info: I am clinical Medical Assistant and I Coordinated clinic activities, room patients, took vitals and medical history, scheduled tests, assisted physicians with procedures, patient education, recorded information into electronic health Records, performed EKG, triaged phone calls, administered medications orally or by injection, most routes, responded to emergency situations and other department duties as assigned. Performed phlebotomy activities. Managed and maintained the laboratory. EHR super user.  I worked in closed relation with a Medical Doctor as Assistant.

lenders.name: Mariana and Brian
lenders.loan_because: I'm greatful and feel very lucky for what I have.  I feel that it's my obligation as a healthy productive person to help others that are in need.

lenders.name: John and Bonnie
lenders.loan_because: Love the idea of this site. We want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: John is an engineer  who helps to build chemical plants. Bonnie is a writer working on her first book.

lenders.name: Pahl & Judie
lenders.loan_because: To help others make a living just as we have been helped over the years.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired photographer and aquarium employee, now volunteers at aquarium and local animal shelter.  Supporters of the arts and community help organizations.

lenders.name: Jon LP
lenders.loan_because: I believe in making a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: My parents, who work for Unicef internationally, are my biggest heros.  They have shown me what a single person can accomplish.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can, and because I can, I feel it is my duty to do so.  I loan because I believe in the greatness and the beauty of humanity and global community.
lenders.occupational_info: I help raise money to support the day to day operations of a university.

lenders.name: Lowell and Pat
lenders.loan_because: It is a good thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info:
Lowell was a petroleum refining engineer.
Pat was a schoolteacher and homemaker, mother of four.  We have six grandchildren in Texas and Tennessee.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in someone's life. At this point, I can't afford to do a lot so I am happy that I found a way to give a little, but still have an impact.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the state government to help oversee statewide child welfare programs. Part of my job is to review cases of children in foster care to ensure that the agencies working with the families are providing appropriate services.

lenders.name: Brandon
lenders.loan_because: I'd waste the money one something stupid
lenders.occupational_info: Come next January I will be in Africa working with the kind of people I loan too.

lenders.name: Richard Ray
lenders.loan_because: It is right and fair. I loan through Kiva because the organization is effective and virtuous

lenders.name: Clay
lenders.loan_because: This is part of my personal initiative to leverage the infrastructure to make direct change to the world. This is one component of that change machine.
lenders.occupational_info: I help design and change existing very large computer software systems so they work better for people's needs. Much in the same way that people change villages so that they work better for the people who live in them.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: the world is a better place when people help eachother.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in school

lenders.name: Gemma
lenders.loan_because: With out the help of friends, family and sometimes perfect strangers it would have been very diffucult to continue my education.  I want to help that stranger continue to reach their dreams and goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a single mother of a beautiful 3 year old. I currently go to school to earn my degree in social service and work full time as a receptionist.

lenders.name: Tom & Jen
lenders.loan_because: Helping each other will hopefully bring us all together and help us realize that only together can we make this a better world.

lenders.name: KANDI
lenders.loan_because: I am an entreprenur, and  I know how difficult it is to begin. I have a heart for those who aren't afraid to try.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a public safety officer on a University campus

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I know first hand how difficult it is for people to get loans and realize their dreams... and how rewarding it is to see them get loans to get into their first home, dream home or even start a new business.

lenders.name: Todd
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a real contribution to the lives of others and communicate to others that people care about them and follow Jesus' example of serving others.

lenders.name: NICOLE
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student in the 9th grade

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: not only it makes me "high" but it made a difference in the borrowers' lives and their communities. Thank you Oprah for introducing this through your show.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a project manager in Jupiter Capital Pte Ltd, an investment firm that thrives through niche and common sense. Bringing thoughts to actions has always been the priority. I love every lesson and mentor I've encountered and looking forward to more opportunities.

lenders.name: Ana
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do. It's as simple as that.

lenders.name: Craig
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to help others live their dreams
lenders.occupational_info: Creating inspiring travel experiences

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: I am thankful for my blessings and wish to share with those who are working for a better life.

lenders.name: jeb
lenders.loan_because: There is no place for hunger in this world. I dream of a day when all will have food, clean water and shelter.
lenders.occupational_info:
Retired from mostly general labor. I now play internet poker for extra money. Very risky but I treat it like a business to fill my time. I make small bets in hopes of one day seeing my dreams come true.
You are one of those dreams.

lenders.name: 3princessesmomma
lenders.loan_because: I want to see others get a chance to make a difference in their own lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I write about personal finance and teach others how to make their household finances work best for them

lenders.name: the Pony Wars
lenders.loan_because: we would want someone to loan to us if we were in the situation many of these people are in...like if we rocked so hard we blew an amp and couldn't afford a new one. A small loan could be the difference between rocking hard and not rocking at all.
lenders.occupational_info: We rock so hard...like all the time. It is hard, but enjoyable. Rocking related accidents are relatively few and far between. All in all it affords a pretty nice lifestyle if you include the day jobs.

lenders.name: Danielle
lenders.loan_because: I will see directly the impact of the loan. I also like the fact of helping women in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a utilities company (electricity provider) in the customer service department.

lenders.name: Lorraine
lenders.occupational_info: It's the same kind of system than in kiva. I lend some money to French people who want to create their business and who are too poor to get the trust of a bank.

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: Microlending gives those who are deemed not credit worthy a chance to improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a nurse that is helping improve care to veterans

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is so simple and effective.
lenders.occupational_info: I make paintings.

lenders.name: Carolyn
lenders.loan_because: I want to have a direct and personal means to help other people have better lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a sculptor who makes public art, and also a graphic designer.

lenders.name: PhoenixAZHorseProperty
lenders.loan_because: I can.  How wonderful is that?

lenders.name: stephanie
lenders.loan_because: I would like to give to others that are struggling to find the means they need to improve thier future.
lenders.occupational_info: I help developmentally disabled with mental illnesses deal with behavior problems that occur.

lenders.name: Rosemary
lenders.loan_because: I haven't yet...Waiting for Kiva to find more people with ideas and no resource. I am excited for the opportunity after seeing how families lives are changed for the good. The little interest a savings account pays is tiny opportunity cost for me.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a small office and the accounting for a foundation in the midwest.

lenders.name: Billy & Cherie
lenders.loan_because: We have been so fortunate in our life, and want to help others achieve their dreams.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: Others are in just as much need as I am.  The difference is that I can reach out and help make others' dreams come true.

lenders.name: Kalle
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a fighting chance.

lenders.name: Betty
lenders.loan_because: I am tired, bankrupt and beaten down, but at least I can do one small thing that matters to someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in advertising on television for different tv stations all ove the US.  I help them manage their available time to sell.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: Deseo que ayudar mis hermanos en Centroamerica y Sudamerica.
lenders.occupational_info: Soy un maestro de Espanol.

lenders.name: Luca
lenders.loan_because: universal brotherhood
lenders.occupational_info: pilgrim on earth

lenders.name: Filip Salomonsson
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Kara & Kevin
lenders.loan_because: We are blessed with abundance in this land, the greatest joy is in sharing it with others!
lenders.occupational_info: Kevin teaches high school students reading and writing, Kara studies plants, soil, and conservation science.

lenders.name: Sheena
lenders.loan_because: I have traveled a great deal and seen just how much a small loan can help.  Investing in people, not just projects, is important.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in tourism and have operated my own business

lenders.name: Jordan
lenders.loan_because: everyone should be given an opportunity to thrive.
lenders.occupational_info: going to school for my master's in social work.

lenders.name: Janna
lenders.loan_because: This can help people avoid having to make the agonizing choice to leave their families behind and come here to work toward a better life and future.

lenders.name: sharon
lenders.loan_because:
I believe in the power of people helping people.  I believe most people have it in them to do better than they are today if given a chance.  

It is FUN

I believe in people!!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a healthcare worker

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: It's the best way to help.. giving a loan allows dignity

lenders.name: Michael Hornak
lenders.loan_because: ...because I'm a young entrepreneur myself, and I know it can be hard to find the help I need, even in the United States.

lenders.name: June W.
lenders.loan_because: i can make a difference person to person.

lenders.name: Besmir
lenders.loan_because: I have the opportunity to give a loan and the responsibility of having an opportunity leads me to help other's who are less fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: University Student

lenders.name: deena
lenders.loan_because: I value the personal connection made, in knowing the specific person being given a start in becoming self supporting.
lenders.occupational_info: I have spent my life in teaching people to effect social change

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: I think it's so great that I can help someone out who really needs it, even though they're so far away and I'll probably never meet them.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a community mental health agency, contracted into schools to do therapy with middle and high school kids.

lenders.name: Perla
lenders.loan_because: I can help someone to build a foundation for their future. It's great way to lend out a hand to people in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a Packing Company and we pack  Cherries, Blueberries, Walnuts and then we ship them all over the world.

lenders.name: Holly
lenders.loan_because: I work for the federal government.  This is my way of guaranteeing that US tax dollars (my paycheck) fund social causes!
lenders.occupational_info: I work on computers.

lenders.name: Rick
lenders.loan_because: Just "Paying it forward"

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: The ability of people to be in charge of their own future is so powerful.
lenders.occupational_info: Left corporate job to start my own company.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: loaning nominal sums of money to entrepreneurs throughout the world allows me to positively impact the lives of others.
lenders.occupational_info: i help businesses grow and transition.  I help families plan their financial futures

lenders.name: Marcelle
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people improve their lives and realize their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I create art for a textile company - making signs for our retail stores, creating ads for magazines, and taking photos for our website.

lenders.name: sydney
lenders.loan_because: i think its a wonderful thing to be involved in. i am going to get my whole community involved, starting with my high school and then branching it out as the knowledge spreads.
lenders.occupational_info: i am a freshman at CHS in texas. I love learning and will do anything to get new information. i am a pre ap and ap straight A student. Even as a freshman i am taking college classes and getting credits done.

lenders.name: Maggie
lenders.loan_because: everyone desires a chance.

lenders.name: Katrina & Sean
lenders.loan_because: The gift of giving is contagious and we want to be involved in the opprotunity to make a difference in the lives of others.
lenders.occupational_info: We are thinking of starting a business of our own, but in the mean time I am working as an engineer with Sprint and in the infancy stages of applying to Law School.  My husband is a truck driver and has been with internationally known UPS for 12+ years.

lenders.name: Gerry
lenders.loan_because: it gives me pleasure to help others, in some small way, to achieve their goals and dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I am self employed doing beautiful hand lettering (calligraphy) on special projects for others.

lenders.name: Doug&Danlu
lenders.loan_because: Government and large lending institutions have lost their way. Individuals and micro-loans speed funds to needy people seeking a hand up not a hand out.
lenders.occupational_info: We produce video programs with subject matter for the Chinese and Asian American communities that informs, entertains and enlightens.

lenders.name: Alfred
lenders.loan_because: Every human being deserves the opportunity to better their lot in life.  I believe people living in developing countries can do amazing work if given that opportunity.

lenders.name: IndieBusinessNetwork
lenders.occupation: Small Business Trade and Advocacy Group
lenders.loan_because: We believe that entrepreneurship ensures the kind of personal growth that leads to success in both life and business. This is what we do for our member businesses, and we want to do it for Kiva entrepreneurs as well. We want to help people become self-sufficient and break the poverty cycle.
lenders.occupational_info: We empower women to maximize their potential through small business ownership.

lenders.name: Benjamin & Satoko
lenders.loan_because: we can.
lenders.occupational_info: People come to me with a problem or they are in in pain, and I try to work out a settlement or deal with those who hurt them.  Obviously, money can't heal all wounds, but it's the best thing we got.  My wife studies a lot. She spends a lot of time memorizing body parts and bones I notice.

lenders.name: Carole
lenders.loan_because: I have lived in Africa and Haiti for 25 years  and have seen how difficult it is for the less privileged to make a living. I like to help those who help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a professional photographer, do freelance work and lead my own photo tours to New Mexico, France and India.

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: You can give money to help feed or clothe someone for a day, but if loan someone money to start a business, they can provide for themselves and their families for a lifetime.  This web site is amazing and I feel as blessed as the recipients to be a part of this!
lenders.occupational_info: I help manage events to sell collectible items. Most often these items are sold to raise funds for charities.

lenders.name: Jaqui
lenders.loan_because: I want to help change the world

lenders.name: Sam
lenders.loan_because: I want to help however I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers and the internet.

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: I spend 25.00 a week in cappuccino's.  If that small amount can make that big difference in someone's life, I obviously don't need coffee.
lenders.occupational_info: Healing and caring for sick or handicapped individuals.

lenders.name: Todd & Sarah
lenders.loan_because: It is so easy to help everyone on the planet. Let's just do it !
lenders.occupational_info: Test drive prototype cars.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: What impresses me most is how becoming self-sufficient can change the loan recipient's quality of life, both in terms of economic conditions but also on a personal level as well. I love KIVA!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a writer. I write user manuals, process and policy documentation, training manuals, proposals; I create e-training modules (and more!) for a software company.

lenders.name: Evelyn
lenders.loan_because: This is a good way to help people help themselves. It's good karma to share blessings and good karma begets more good karma!
lenders.occupational_info: I manage nurses and paramedics who fly in emergency helicopters to take care of critically ill and injured people.

lenders.name: Joy
lenders.loan_because: It is an amazing opportunity to affect people you have read about in the news and in books. I wish these families the very best in their lives.

lenders.name: Sabir
lenders.loan_because: I am proud of the ambitious, hard working individuals in the world that try to overcome the most difficult of hardships to create a better life for their loved ones.

lenders.name: Jeffrey
lenders.loan_because: I wanna help!!!

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: I appreciate the drive and determination that people possess to succeed.  If I can help them on their journey, then I will.

lenders.name: Chef Jan
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others be successful and independant, as someone helped me!
lenders.occupational_info: Teach professional cooking skills

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: I believe a small contribution from a worldwide family is far better than a large contribution by few. I would like to help the global market. "The earth is but one country and mankind its citizens."
lenders.occupational_info: I love my work. I get to teach, and I play on computers all day.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.occupation: Finance and Operations Dir for non-profit

lenders.name: Janiece
lenders.loan_because: I'm so thankful for the positive things in my life that I want to share a portion of the opportunity I've enjoyed with someone who needs help.
lenders.occupational_info: I design telephony systems for large businesses, specializing in call center technologies.

lenders.name: Kyle
lenders.loan_because: Kiva has made it possible to loan one amount of money many times over, thus benefiting many different ventures by those trying to make a difference in their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with the United Steelworkers union, which represents workers by standing up for their rights to a good wage, safe working conditions, and guaranteed healthcare.  We also work to elect politicians who stand up for our workers.

lenders.name: Sheri
lenders.loan_because: ....finally after all these years I am able to.
lenders.occupational_info: Needed: to sustain my life as I live.

lenders.name: Leslie
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful for being able to help make a difference in someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the automotive industry, preparing paperwork for vehicle ownership and registration.
